newsitem.title: UK: CAP reform must accompany EU expansion-UK's Blair.
newsitem.headline: CAP reform must accompany EU expansion-UK's Blair.

text.p: Prime Minister Tony Blair on Wednesday called the European Union's Common Agricultural Policy(CAP)"a disgrace" and said its reform must accompany any moves to enlarge the Community.
"It is a disgrace in the way it works at the moment and should be reformed in the interests of all of the people of Europe," Blair said at Prime Minister's question time in parliament.
